sqlUnit.name: user_mgr_list_test
sqlUnit.sql: select u.id,u.username,u.full_name,o.seq_names,u.mobile_no,u.qq,u.email, (select t.name from t_n_position t where t.id=u.position_id) as position, (select tmp.busi_name from t_n_dict tmp where tmp.busi_value=u.state and tmp.parent_id=(select id from t_n_dict where busi_value='DATA_STATE')) as state ,u.create_time from t_n_user u,t_n_org o where u.org_id=o.id [and (u.username like '%:name%' or u.full_name like '%:name%') ] [ and u.org_id in(:orgIds) ] [and u.org_id in (select t.id from t_n_org t where t.seq_parent_ids like '%.:orgId.%' or t.id=:orgId) ] [and u.state=:state ] [and (u.mobile_no like ':info%' or u.email like ':info%') ] order by u.create_time asc

sqlUnit.name: test_org_async_tree
sqlUnit.sql: select t.id,t.parent_id,t.sort_order,t.id as orgId,t.name,t.code, (select tmp.busi_name from t_n_dict tmp where tmp.busi_value=t.type and tmp.parent_id=(select id from t_n_dict where busi_value='ORG_TYPE')) as type, t.sort_order as sortOrder,t.contacts,t.contact_number, (select count(o.id) from t_n_org o where o.parent_id=t.id) as isChild from t_n_org t where [t.parent_id=:parentId] order by t.sort_order asc

sqlUnit.name: menu_auto_complete_test
sqlUnit.sql: select t.id,t.name,t.name as labelName,t.parent_id,t.state,t.resource_id,t.sort_order from t_n_menu t [ where t.name like '%:term%'] order by t.sort_order asc
